name: Stalinist One
description: Imagine a post-apocalyptic world in the future. Imagine hiding in the underground: people, dirty air and despair. To transfer information, they still use fonts. But they have become simple, with a utilitarian and strong spirit. Stalinist is typeface for a post-apocalyptic time. Stalinist is a font made in Moscow at the end of the 21st century. That's the way it is. Stalinist One was designed collaboratively between Alexey Maslov and Jovanny Lemonad. Updated September 2015: Internal metadata corrected.
author: Alexey Maslov, Jovanny Lemonad
